name: PADDLE BADDLE
description:
By: @AshleyPringle

PADDLE BADDLE is an exhilarating local multiplayer Pong-like with revolutionary Dual Stick action! Now you control the paddle AND the ball!

EXTREMELY NEW WINNITRON EDITION! Includes Practice Mode, so you can sharpen your skills against some crappy AI!

Master the powerful SLAP SHOT technique by wailing on your computer gamepad!

DESTROY your opponent in their MOMENT OF WEAKNESS and DRAIN their points away!

Compete against a friend and win the PADDLE BADDLE!

(Video game pad featuring analogue joysticks recommended for optimum gaming experience)

Source code: https://github.com/arnodick/paddle_baddle
